brainly_data.question:
What is the best definition for the underlined word based on the following sentence?

"There is a myriad of reasons as to why Douglass wanted to escape slavery, but to have his freedom was his most important reason."

A. A lack
B. Limited number
C. Special set
D. A large, indefinite number
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question:
What is the best definition for the underlined word based on the following sentence?

"There is a myriad of reasons as to why Douglass wanted to escape slavery, but to have his freedom was his most important reason."

A. A lack
B. Limited number
C. Special set
D. A large, indefinite number
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: The definition of myriad is a set of great numbers and by using context clues the best answer for the question is D
